words.source: H1696 (דָּבַר, 'to speak'), conjunction + Piel wayyiqtol 3ms; KJV 'And Moses spake', ESV 'But Moses said', NASB 'But Moses spoke'
H4872 (מֹשֶׁה, 'Moses'), proper noun; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'Moses'
H6440 (פָּנִים, 'face'), preposition-lamed + noun common masculine plural construct; KJV 'before', ESV 'to', NASB 'before'
H3068 (יְהוָה, 'the LORD'), proper noun divine; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'the LORD'
H559 (אָמַר, 'to say'), preposition-lamed + Qal infinitive construct; KJV 'saying', ESV 'saying', NASB 'saying'
H1121 (בֵּן, 'son'), noun common masculine plural construct; KJV 'the children of', ESV 'the people of', NASB 'the sons of'
H3478 (יִשְׂרָאֵל, 'Israel'), proper noun; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'Israel'
H3808 (לֹא, 'not'), adverb of negation; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'not' or 'have not'
H8085 (שָׁמַע, 'to hear/listen'), Qal perfect 3cp; KJV 'have not hearkened', ESV 'have not listened', NASB 'have not listened'
H413 (אֶל, 'to'), preposition + 1cs suffix; KJV 'unto me', ESV 'to me', NASB 'to me'
H349 (אֵיךְ, 'how'), conjunction + interrogative adverb; KJV 'how then', ESV 'how then', NASB 'how then'
H8085 (שָׁמַע, 'to hear/listen'), Qal imperfect 3ms + 1cs suffix; KJV 'shall Pharaoh hear me', ESV 'shall Pharaoh listen to me', NASB 'will Pharaoh listen to me'
H6547 (פַּרְעֹה, 'Pharaoh'), proper noun; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'Pharaoh'
H589 (אֲנִי, 'I'), conjunction + pronoun 1cs; KJV 'who am', ESV 'since I am', NASB 'for I am'
H6189 (עָרֵל, 'uncircumcised'), adjective masculine singular construct; KJV 'of uncircumcised', ESV 'unskilled in', NASB 'unskilled in' — Hebrew idiom for speech impediment
H8193 (שָׂפָה, 'lip'), noun common feminine dual absolute; KJV 'lips', ESV 'speech', NASB 'speech' — עֲרַל שְׂפָתָיִם lit. 'uncircumcised of lips', idiom meaning halting/impeded speech
